method.name: EnumerateDevices
method.tp:docstring: Get the list of modem devices.

arg.name: devices
arg.tp:docstring: List of object paths of modem devices known to the system.

signal.name: DeviceAdded
signal.tp:docstring: A device was added to the system.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The object path of the newly added device.

signal.name: DeviceRemoved
signal.tp:docstring: A device was removed from the system, and is no longer available.

arg.name: device
arg.tp:docstring: The object path of the device that was just removed.
